mapper.insert: insert into employee (first_name, last_name, gender, phone, email, birth, hire_date, zipcode, addr, addr_detail, addr_etc, department_id, salary) values ( #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{hire_date}, #{zipcode}, #{addr}, #{addr_detail}, #{addr_etc}, #{department_id}, #{salary})
